bg_window

Get the BG data from the 18-24 hour post-op window,

bg_window(cp_id, surgery_date, surgery_end_time)

Arguments

cp_id
CommunityPatientID
surgery_date
The date of surgery in ISO format
surgery_end_time
The surgery end time in HH:MM

Value

Returns a data frame with cp_id, start,end (of the BG Window) min, max, count_values, & count_180.

Details

returns the start & end time of the BG window, the minimum & maximum BG values, the total number of values and the number over 180.

Examples

## single
cp_id <- c("1501668269")
surgery_date <- "2014-10-02"
surgery_end_time <- "13:22"

# bg_window(cp_id, surgery_date, surgery_end_time)
